description: Support to the elaboration and implementation of National Action Programmes in affected African country parties

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Support to the elaboration and implementation of National Action Programmes in affected African country parties. The countries include: Burundi, Cote d'Ivoire, Niger and Uganda.  Outputs include:


1. National and district development plans/programmes and budgets reflecting NAP issues
2. Information and knowledge on impacts of drought and land degradation
3. Resources mobilized for implementation of key NAP priorities
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Support to National Action Pro

title: Support to National Action Programmes in Africa
